item.description:
Hi Everyone...

Our NEXT Brunch will be a SATURDAY brunch @ 12:00PM on February 28th (the last day in February) at:

Orinoco Kitchen
477 Shawmut Ave
Boston, MA 02118
(617) 369-7075
Price: Reasonable
www.orinocokitchen.com (check them out on the web)

The Orinoco Kitchen has been written about extensively and is considered one of Boston's very best. It was even featured in the NY Times. Like the Franklin Cafe, it is tucked away on a quaint treelined street right in the heart of the South End.

I hope to see you at the Orinoco Kitchen!

Cheers,
Michael
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Mike/Meet up

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Our First Saturday Brunch (20 & 30 somethings for brunch, etc... )
